Steps: Using getCurrentPostion returns array detailing geolocation including latitude, longitude, altitude, altitude accuracy, heading, speed
Using watchPosition() returns geolocation details of the user if location sharing is enabled
Using watchPosition() will not return geolocation details even if location sharing is enabled
Using clearWatch() should clear any active location watches
Using clearWatch() when there are no active location watches returns an error stating no active watch positions are available
If user location sharing has been enabled then using canBeRequested returns a boolean value true
If user location sharing has not been enabled then using canBeRequested returns a boolean value false
Using currentPosition returns geolocation details of the user if location sharing is enabled
Using currentPosition will not return geolocation details even if location sharing is enabled
